title: How to Show Touch Keyboard Button on Taskbar in Windows 10

steps.title: Select Show touch keyboard button from the context menu.
steps.content: Select Show touch keyboard button from the context menu. This will enable the touch keyboard button on your taskbar. You can also disable the icon using the same method.

steps.title: Open touch keyboard by clicking or tapping the taskbar icon.
steps.content: Open touch keyboard by clicking or tapping the taskbar icon.

steps.title: Type with the keyboard.
steps.content: Type with the keyboard. Select a text field and type away!
